hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD4$ tens and $\purpleD5$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{45}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/54f9b5990233fe48cae039e7597c1d3f48bd4fdb)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD3$ tens and $\maroonD6$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{36}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/efa82df8fd0f6b18a9762684d197a0c6d9d308d4)

Our sum shows $8$ tens and $1$ one, or $81$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/15cb5106408c9c5e739afcb412d9c88324a50fbc)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{45} + \maroonD{36} =81$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/ee811f8edb50fa95b9a645b55631f0456a7df089)

[[☃ radio 1]]
